solution_line_template: The number of trees that Amiyah cut is {percentage_cut}*{initial_trees} = <<{percentage_cut}*{initial_trees}={trees_cut}>>{trees_cut}
The number of trees remaining on the farm after she cut {trees_cut} trees is {initial_trees}-{trees_cut} = <<{initial_trees}-{trees_cut}={trees_remaining}>>{trees_remaining}

For every tree that Amiyah cut, she plants {trees_planted_per_cut_tree} new trees, and since she cut {trees_cut} trees, she planted {trees_cut}*{trees_planted_per_cut_tree} = <<{trees_cut}*{trees_planted_per_cut_tree}={new_trees_planted}>>{new_trees_planted} new trees.
The total number of trees on the farm is now {trees_remaining}+{new_trees_planted} = <<{trees_remaining}+{new_trees_planted}={total_trees_on_farm}>>{total_trees_on_farm} trees.
